Flynn.Description: Mid 20's, tall. Doesn't dress his own age (younger), can be a bit dishevelled at times. Brunette, messy hair.
Flynn.Building: I would love to have access to an observatory, maybe if I could look at them closer I could finally paint the stars.
Flynn.Election: I didn't realise there was an election coming up, who won!?
Flynn.Best Friend: Hey , doing anything interesting? I was just about to start a new painting But I can't figure out what I should paint yet.
Flynn.BuildingComplete: This is just amazing, I can't wait to see it! Thanks!
Flynn.Job: I paint for a living, not a luxurious lifestyle choice but I get by fairly well.
Flynn.Quest: I need some stuff to make more paint with, do you think you can get me some brightly coloured plants? The brighter the better!
Flynn.QuestComplete: Thanks for this, I was running dangerously low on paint to keep considering myself and artist.

Peter.Description: Weathered looking, on the short side, latter half of 50's, kind looking face, typically dressed to go fishing (what that looks like I have no idea), grey-ish hair
Peter.Building: I always wanted to work with boats, it never really mattered in what way.
Peter.Introduction: I don't think we've met, Peter is my own name.
Peter.Acquaintance: I think I'll go fishing today, sounds wonderful don't you think?
Peter.Friend: I spend a lot of time by the sea, I think my wife is a bit tired of it.
Peter.Election: Oh I never vote anymore, it's all rigged anyways you know.
Peter.Best Friend: I don't know what I would do if I didn't have Poppy and Mirijam.
Peter.BuildingComplete: People get so much enjoyment out of boats, I'm really glad I get to help with that now thanks!
Peter.Job: The Boat Hire is the best place I could ever work in my opinion.
Peter.Quest: I haven't been out on a boat in years, I don't really have a reason to anymore...
Peter.QuestComplete: Incredible! Thank you! I don't know how I could ever repay you.

Poppy.Description: Early 50's, kind face, bleached blonde hair, Garden overalls, Dyes her hair to look younger.
Poppy.Building: I would love to have somewhere outside to relax, other than my garden of course!
Poppy.Introduction: My name is Poppy, It's a pleasure dear.
Poppy.Acquaintance: You should stop by my garden someday, I never miss a chance to show it off!
Poppy.Friend: Something has been eating my lettuces, it's a terrible shame really.
Poppy.Election: I knew that they would be the mayor, I tried to tell my husband Peter but he still won't vote in elections.
Poppy.Best Friend: I wish Mirijam would get out more, it can't be good to be inside so long.
Poppy.BuildingComplete: It's beautiful, I don't think I'll ever leave!
Poppy.Job: Peter insisted I didn't have to work, I would much rather work in my garden anyways, if I had a job I doubt I would get time for gardening.
Poppy.Quest: I could've sworn I left my hat in my garden yesterday, could you be a dear and have a look round for it?
Poppy.QuestComplete: You found it where? Thanks for finding it for me, although I could've sworn that I left it in my own garden!

Mirijam.Description: Small for his age, 10 years old, dark brown hair and eyes, always wears a hoodie of some kind, always looks fed up with something.
Mirijam.Building: I really wish there was an arcade nearby, they have much more games than I do.
Mirijam.Acquaintance: I wish I had someone that did everything for me.
Mirijam.Friend: When I'm older, no one can tell me what to do and then I can play games all the time.
Mirijam.Election: I don't really mind who gets to be the mayor.
Mirijam.Best Friend: I don't understand why people choose to go outside, inside is much more fun.
Mirijam.BuildingComplete: Wow! I can't wait to beat everyone else's high score!
Mirijam.Job: I don't have a job, I'm ten.
Mirijam.Quest: My mother banned chocolate from the house, but she'll never know if you happen to bring me some...
Mirijam.QuestComplete: You're amazing, now how am I going to get it into the house?

Jonas.Description: 24 years old, black haired, green eyes, dresses formally most of the time.
Jonas.Building: I have always wanted a job where I could talk for a living, a Tourist Office would be the perfect place I think.
Jonas.Introduction: Wonderful meeting you! How is everything with you?
Jonas.Acquaintance: I always preferred the morning, what about you?
Jonas.Friend: Have you seen my sister around today, she like to hide because she knows I have something for her to do.
Jonas.Election: I always get my sister to help me choose a candidate, she's a better judge of character than I am.
Jonas.Best Friend: Trying to get Maeve to stop reading is like trying to talk to a brick wall.
Jonas.BuildingComplete: Absolutely fantastic, thank so very much!
Jonas.Job: Talking to people and helping them out is one of my favourite things to do so the Tourist Office is just perfect for me.
Jonas.Quest: Could you find my sister, she's not been studying AGAIN and she has exams coming up, I'll bet she's just off reading somewhere.
Jonas.QuestComplete: Great you found her! I'm off to talk some sense into her then.

Maeve.Description: 16 years old, wears clothes too big for her, bright colours, black hair, green eyes
Maeve.Building: It would be great to live right near a library, then I'd have access to a whole pile of books.
Maeve.Acquaintance: Have you met my brother Jonas? He can be a bit of a drag sometimes.
Maeve.Friend: I got a new book the other day, but I've already finished it, authors should write more so I don't get through them as quick.
Maeve.Election: I can't vote yet but I help Jonas pick a person, he spends ages worrying about it otherwise.
Maeve.Best Friend: I started trying to write a book but I just kept getting stuck figuring out the smallest of details.
Maeve.BuildingComplete: That is so cool, surely I can't run out of books now?
Maeve.Job: I volunteer in the Library at the weekend, being surrounded by books is like being in an amazing dream.
Maeve.Quest: Hey, glad you're here, my book is missing, I NEED to know how it ends, please help me find it!
Maeve.QuestComplete: Oh thank goodness you found it, I was beginning to think I'd never find out what happened!

Serena.Description: mid 30's, very tall, brunette, blue eyes, stylish dresser, always looks like she's going out somewhere.
Serena.Building: I would love for there to be a hair salon here, then I could do hair professionally instead.
Serena.Acquaintance: How've you been today? I took a walk early this morning, some things you miss if you're not early enough to see them.
Serena.Friend: How has your day been so far, because mine's been great!
Serena.Election: I feel like I'd be a fantastic mayor, maybe I should run next time.
Serena.Best Friend: I talk too much sometimes, not sure if that's a good or a bad thing though.
Serena.BuildingComplete: Oh this place is fabulous, come by anytime, I'd be delighted to have you!
Serena.Job: I love working at the Hair Salon, I've never dreamed of any other job
Serena.Quest: I cut Flynn's hair and I think I made it worse than it usually is, would it be possible for you to find me something I can give him to wear on his head untill it grows out again?
Serena.QuestComplete: This is perfect, he'll love it I'm sure, although I don't think he can tell his hair is different.

Walter.Description: Mid Fifties, sweaters and jackets and dress pants, brown hair fading to grey, hazel coloured eyes.
Walter.Building: My dream would be to work in a shop of some kind, maybe selling furniture?
Walter.Introduction: Ahhhh you must be the new one, welcome!
Walter.Acquaintance: How long have you been here for?
Walter.Friend: I keep getting asked to make tables, but no chairs...what's the point of a table if you have nowhere to sit?
Walter.Election: The person that I vote for never seems to get elected, I wonder why that is...
Walter.Best Friend: I wanted to extend my house a little while ago, maybe a sunroom or something?
Walter.Job: The Furniture Store is the best place I could work, I don't think I'd be happy anywhere else.
Walter.Quest: I need the nicest wood you can find, Mara just asked me could I make her a huge closet, she must have mounds of clothes lying around.
Walter.QuestComplete: You have some do you? This is perfect thanks, I'm sure Mara will love it when I'm finished.

Mara.Description: Red hair (very red, not orange), wears fancy clothing, always a dress, high heels, tall irregardless of shoes.
Mara.Building: I think an inn would be perfect in this town.
Mara.Introduction: Darling, I'm Mara, it's great to finally meet you.
Mara.Acquaintance: It's been a while, hope you've been doing well.
Mara.Friend: Do you play an instrument? It would be amazing if someone could accompany me while I sing!
Mara.Election: What do you think about me as the mayor someday?I'm positive I would be stunning.
Mara.Best Friend: Does this outfit suit me? I'm not so sure about it.
Mara.BuildingComplete: Simply marvelous, this place is fantastic!
Mara.Job: My job is wonderful, being the host is one of my favourite things to be.
Mara.Quest: I know this is an awkward favour to ask, but could you possibly find out if Walter likes me? I've been wondering for a while but I could never work up the courage to ask.
Mara.QuestComplete: Did he say yes? He did! What am I going to say to him?! Thanks, I have to go think of something!

Tessa.Description: Athletic, always in a tracksuit, short, black hair, facial features kind of pointy, brown eyes.
Tessa.Building: I'd love if there was a lighthouse here, for safety of course, not the cool view.
Tessa.Friend: Walking is a phenomenal way to clear your head, especially if you've had a bad day.
Tessa.Election: Don't tell anyone, but every year choose who to vote for randomly, how else would I decide?
Tessa.Best Friend: I've been trying to get my girls to get out more, I think I'm succeeding.....maybe.
Tessa.BuildingComplete: This is super, I can't wait to check it out!
Tessa.Job: The lighthouse has an amazing view, and I get to see it most days.
Tessa.Quest: I'm playing hide-and-seek with my girls at the moment, but they must be experts at this because I can't find them anywhere! can you help me?
Tessa.QuestComplete: You found them! I'm glad, I was worried I was going to be all day searching for the little monsters!

Desmond.Description: Round faced, short, wearing an apron, black hair, balding, green eyes.
Desmond.Building: It would be amazing to have somewhere professional to bake.
Desmond.Introduction: I haven't seen you around here before.
Desmond.Acquaintance: Sunny days always seem happier, I'm not too sure about the rain.
Desmond.Friend: My wife Tessa loves being outside, we're very different people.
Desmond.Election: I love figuring out who would be the best to vote for, it's like a game!
Desmond.Best Friend: I love hanging out with my two little girls, I've been trying to teach them how to bake scones recently.
Desmond.Job: Baking is what I know and love, I can't imagine not baking for a living.
Desmond.Quest: Could you deliver this parcel to Leo? I wanted to thank him for fixing my oven but I'm fairly busy at the moment. Thanks!
Desmond.QuestComplete: Is it delivered? Thanks for helping me out, really appreciated.

Leo.Description: Blonde messy hair, blue eyes, greasy looking, wears khaki cargo pants all the time, medium height.
Leo.Building: This place should have a hardware store, it's a highly important service.
Leo.Acquaintance: Grapes will explode if you put them in a microwave, I don't recommend doing this, it take forever to clean up afterwards.
Leo.Friend: I know quite a lot of weird stuff, I find them interesting though.
Leo.Election: Voting is such a chore, there must be a better less boring way of deciding who the mayor is.
Leo.Best Friend: Figuring out how something works is great, the I know what to do if it ever breaks!
Leo.BuildingComplete: This place is just awesome, I don't know what to say!
Leo.Job: The hardware store is great, not sure what else I'd ever want to do
Leo.Quest: I'm trying to fix this circuit, not sure what it does but I'm sure I'll find out eventually, I need some gold to do it though, would you get me some?
Leo.QuestComplete: Gold is an excellent conductor, I could use copper, but gold won't wear as easily, so win win!

Willow.Description: Twin of Aspen, Black hair, Green eyes, 7 years old, wears dresses most of the time, has curly hair, both love bright coulours.
Willow.Building: My mother is always talking about a lighthouse, I think if there was one it would make her happy.
Willow.Acquaintance: When I'm older I wanna be a vet, because animals are so so nice.
Willow.Election: I don't even know how to vote.
Willow.Best Friend: Aspen likes reading, so I get her to do it out loud because I want to hear the story, I just don't want to make my eyes all tired.
Willow.Job: Work is for adults to do.
Willow.Quest: I want to get something for my mom because it's her birthday eventually right? Could you find me something really special for her?
Willow.QuestComplete: I think my mom will love this, thanks for helping me find something.

Aspen.Description: Twin of Willow, Black straight hair, Green eyes, 7 Years old, Wears dungarees or pants and a bright coloured top, both love bright colours.
Aspen.Building: A lighthouse would be amazing, at least that's what my mother says.
Aspen.Friend: I wanted a dog, but my mother is always saying no.
Aspen.Job: Maybe I'd be a vet when I'm older.
Aspen.Quest: Are you going to the mine? I really need something shiny because I heard that some birds like shiny things and I really really like birds so, please?
Aspen.QuestComplete: This looks shiny enough, I'm gonna leave it in the garden to see which bird likes it the most!
